<h2 id="1-ç®€è¿°">ğŸ“Œ1. ç®€è¿°</h2>
<p>YtyMark-javaé¡¹ç›®åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤å¤§æ¨¡å—ï¼š</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>UIç•Œé¢ï¼ˆytyedit-markï¼‰</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>markdownæ–‡æœ¬è§£æå’Œæ¸²æŸ“ï¼ˆytymarkï¼‰</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>æœ¬æ–‡ä¸»è¦å†…å®¹ä¸º<strong>UIç•Œé¢</strong>ç›¸å…³åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚</p>
<p>å…³äºmarkdownæ–‡æœ¬è§£æå™¨UIç•Œé¢çš„å®ç°ã€‚åœ¨è¿™æ•´ä¸ªæµç¨‹ä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚æœé€šè¿‡è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼å®ç°é«˜å†…èšä½è€¦åˆï¼Œå¯é‡ç”¨ï¼Œæ˜“äºé˜…è¯»ï¼Œæ˜“äºæ‰©å±•ï¼Œæ˜“äºç»´æŠ¤ç­‰ã€‚</p>
<pre><code>YtyMark-java
â”œâ”€â”€ ytyedit-mark/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ src/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ main/
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ java/
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ editor/             # JavaFX UI ç•Œé¢
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ enums/              # Iconå›¾æ ‡ç­‰
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ utils/              # èµ„æºè¯»å–ç­‰
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ window/             # è‡ªå®šä¹‰çª—å£ï¼ˆä¸»çª—å£ã€å¼¹æ¡†ï¼‰
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ RenderMarkdown      # è§£æå’Œæ¸²æŸ“
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ YtyEditApplication  # ä¸»ç¨‹åºå…¥å£

<h2 id="2-javafx-ç”¨æˆ·ç•Œé¢">ğŸ§©2. JavaFX ç”¨æˆ·ç•Œé¢</h2>
<p><strong>ç›®æ ‡</strong>ï¼šä¸ºç”¨æˆ·æä¾›å¯è§†åŒ–çš„æ–‡æœ¬è¾“å…¥ã€å®æ—¶é¢„è§ˆã€ç¼–è¾‘ã€ä¿å­˜ã€å¯¼å‡ºï¼ˆPDF/HTML)å’Œä¸»é¢˜åˆ‡æ¢ç­‰åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚</p>
<p><strong>ä½¿ç”¨åˆ°çš„è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼</strong>ï¼š</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><strong>å·¥å‚æ¨¡å¼</strong>ï¼š<strong>æ ·å¼çš„åˆ›å»º</strong>é€šè¿‡å·¥å‚æ¨¡å¼æ¥å®Œæˆã€‚</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>ç­–ç•¥æ¨¡å¼</strong>ï¼šåŠ¨æ€é€‰æ‹©å·¥å…·ç•Œé¢æ ·å¼ï¼Œå®ŒæˆUIç•Œé¢çš„<strong>æ ·å¼åˆ‡æ¢</strong>ã€‚</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>è§‚å¯Ÿè€…æ¨¡å¼</strong>ï¼šè¯†åˆ«åˆ°ä¸»é¢˜å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œ<strong>é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“</strong>æ“ä½œï¼›æ ·å¼åˆ‡æ¢åï¼Œæ¸²æŸ“çš„æ–‡å­—æ ·å¼ä¹Ÿéœ€è¦åŒæ­¥è°ƒæ•´ï¼Œå†ç»“åˆç›‘å¬å™¨ï¼ˆè§‚å¯Ÿè€…æ¨¡å¼ï¼‰æ¥å®ç°ä¸»é¢˜å˜åŒ–åé‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“æ–‡æœ¬å†…å®¹ï¼Œé™¤æ­¤ä¹‹å¤–JavaFXä½¿ç”¨äº†å¤§é‡çš„ç›‘å¬å™¨ã€‚</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>å•ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼</strong>ï¼šä¸»é¢˜æ ·å¼ç®¡ç†å™¨ç»Ÿä¸€ç®¡ç†å…¨å±€æ ·å¼ï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›ç»Ÿä¸€è®¿é—®å…¥å£ã€‚</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>è£…é¥°æ¨¡å¼</strong>ï¼šå¯¹è‡ªå®šä¹‰åŸºç¡€å¼¹æ¡†åš<strong>å®šåˆ¶åŒ–çš„æ‰©å±•</strong>ï¼Œå®ç°ä¸åŒåœºæ™¯æ‰€éœ€çš„å¼¹æ¡†ã€‚</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>å‘½ä»¤æ¨¡å¼</strong>ï¼šå°è£…å·¥å…·ç•Œé¢ä¸­çš„åŠŸèƒ½ç‚¹åŠå¿«æ·é”®å‘½ä»¤ã€‚</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>å¤‡å¿˜å½•æ¨¡å¼</strong>ï¼šè´Ÿè´£å®ç°<strong>æ’¤é”€</strong>å’Œ<strong>æ¢å¤</strong>åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå®ç°ç²¾ç»†åˆ°å•å­—ç¬¦çš„æ’¤é”€/æ¢å¤æœºåˆ¶ã€‚</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="21-å·¥å‚æ¨¡å¼">2.1. å·¥å‚æ¨¡å¼</h3>
<p>é€šè¿‡å·¥å‚åˆ›å»ºæ ·å¼ï¼Œå°†é»˜è®¤çš„æ ·å¼åˆ›å»ºå¥½ï¼Œç»Ÿä¸€æ”¾å…¥Mapä¸­ä¿å­˜ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ—¶ç›´æ¥ä»å·¥å‚ä¸­è·å–ã€‚</p>
<pre><code class="language-java">public class StyleFactory {
    private static final Map&lt;Key, Style&gt; STYLE_MAP = new HashMap&lt;&gt;();

    // é¢„å…ˆæ³¨å†Œé»˜è®¤æ ·å¼
    static {
        registerStyle(WindowType.MAIN_WINDOW, ThemeType.LIGHT, new MainWindowLightStyle());
        registerStyle(WindowType.MAIN_WINDOW, ThemeType.DARK, new MainWindowDarkStyle());
        registerStyle(WindowType.DIALOG_WINDOW, ThemeType.LIGHT, new DialogWindowLightStyle());
        registerStyle(WindowType.DIALOG_WINDOW, ThemeType.DARK, new DialogWindowDarkStyle());
    }

    public static void registerStyle(WindowType type, ThemeType theme, Style style) {
        STYLE_MAP.put(new Key(type, theme), style);
    }

    public static Style getStyle(WindowType type, ThemeType theme) {
        Style style = STYLE_MAP.get(new Key(type, theme));
        if (style == null) {
            throw new RuntimeException("çª—å£ç±»å‹æˆ–ä¸»é¢˜ç±»å‹ä¸æ”¯æŒ: " + type + " - " + theme);
        }
        return style;
    }

    ...
}
</code></pre>
<h3 id="22-ç­–ç•¥æ¨¡å¼">2.2. ç­–ç•¥æ¨¡å¼</h3>
<p>åŠ¨æ€é€‰æ‹©å·¥å…·ç•Œé¢æ ·å¼ï¼Œå®ŒæˆUIç•Œé¢çš„<strong>æ ·å¼åˆ‡æ¢</strong>ã€‚å¹¶æ”¯æŒå¯¹å·²æœ‰çª—å£æ ·å¼çš„è‡ªç”±ç»„åˆï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚æ·±è‰²çš„ä¸»çª—å£+æµ…è‰²çš„å¼¹æ¡†ã€‚</p>
<p>ä½¿ç”¨<code>setTheme(ThemeType)</code>æ–¹æ³•å¯ä»¥å¿«é€Ÿåˆ‡æ¢å·²ç»æ­é…å¥½çš„<strong>ä¸»é¢˜</strong>ï¼›ä½¿ç”¨<code>setStyle</code>å¯ä»¥çµæ´»æŒ‡å®šä¸åŒçª—å£çš„æ ·å¼ã€‚</p>
<pre><code class="language-java">public class ThemeContext {
    ...

    // è®¾ç½®æ ·å¼
    public void setTheme(ThemeType theme) {
        WindowType[] values = WindowType.values();
        for (WindowType windowType : values) {
            this.themeManager.setStyle(windowType, theme);
        }
    }

    // è‡ªå®šä¹‰è®¾ç½®ä¸åŒçª—ä½“ä¸åŒæ ·å¼
    public void setStyle(WindowType type, ThemeType theme) {
        this.themeManager.setStyle(type, theme);
    }

    // ä¸»é¢˜åˆ‡æ¢
    public void switchTheme() {
        // æ¸…ç©ºä¹‹å‰çš„æ ·å¼
        scene.getStylesheets().clear();
        this.themeManager.applyStyle(WindowType.MAIN_WINDOW, scene);
    }

}
</code></pre>
<h3 id="23-è§‚å¯Ÿè€…æ¨¡å¼å’Œå•ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼">2.3. è§‚å¯Ÿè€…æ¨¡å¼å’Œå•ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼</h3>
<p>è¯†åˆ«åˆ°ä¸»é¢˜å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œ<strong>é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“</strong>æ“ä½œã€‚æ ·å¼åˆ‡æ¢åï¼Œæ¸²æŸ“çš„æ–‡å­—æ ·å¼ä¹Ÿéœ€è¦åŒæ­¥è°ƒæ•´ï¼Œç»“åˆç›‘å¬å™¨ï¼ˆè§‚å¯Ÿè€…æ¨¡å¼ï¼‰æ¥å®ç°ä¸»é¢˜å˜åŒ–åé‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“æ–‡æœ¬å†…å®¹ï¼Œé™¤æ­¤ä¹‹å¤–JavaFXä½¿ç”¨äº†å¤§é‡çš„ç›‘å¬å™¨ã€‚</p>
<p>è‡ªå®šä¹‰çš„<strong>ä¸»é¢˜ç›‘å¬å™¨</strong>æ¥å£ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-java">public interface ThemeChangeListener {
    void onThemeChanged();
}
</code></pre>
<p>ä¸»é¢˜ç›‘å¬å™¨å°†æœ‰<strong>ä¸»é¢˜ç®¡ç†ç±»</strong>æ¥ç»Ÿä¸€ç®¡ç†ï¼Œå¹¶ç»“åˆ<strong>å•ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼</strong>ï¼Œä½¿å¾—ä¸»é¢˜ç®¡ç†å™¨å…¨å±€å”¯ä¸€ï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›ç»Ÿä¸€è®¿é—®å…¥å£<code>ThemeManager.getInstance()</code>ã€‚</p>
<pre><code class="language-java">public class ThemeManager {

    private static ThemeManager instance;
    private final Map&lt;WindowType, Style&gt; currentStyles = new HashMap&lt;&gt;();
    private final List&lt;ThemeChangeListener&gt; listeners = new ArrayList&lt;&gt;();


    private ThemeManager() {
        // é»˜è®¤ä¸»çª—å£ç™½å¤©æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œå¼¹çª—ç™½è‰²æ¨¡å¼
        currentStyles.put(WindowType.MAIN_WINDOW, new MainWindowLightStyle());
        currentStyles.put(WindowType.DIALOG_WINDOW, new DialogWindowLightStyle());
    }

    public static ThemeManager getInstance() {
        if (instance == null) {
            instance = new ThemeManager();
        }
        return instance;
    }

    public void setStyle(WindowType type, ThemeType theme) {
        currentStyles.put(type, StyleFactory.getStyle(type, theme));
        // é€šçŸ¥æ‰€æœ‰è§‚å¯Ÿè€…ä¸»é¢˜å·²å˜æ›´
        this.notifyThemeChanged();
    }

    ...

    // æ³¨å†Œè§‚å¯Ÿè€…
    public void addThemeChangeListener(ThemeChangeListener listener) {
        listeners.add(listener);
    }
    // æ³¨é”€è§‚å¯Ÿè€…
    public void removeThemeChangeListener(ThemeChangeListener listener) {
        listeners.remove(listener);
    }

    // é€šçŸ¥æ‰€æœ‰è§‚å¯Ÿè€…
    private void notifyThemeChanged() {
        for (ThemeChangeListener listener : listeners) {
            listener.onThemeChanged();
        }
    }
}
</code></pre>
<p><strong>é€šç”¨å¼¹æ¡†</strong>å’Œ<strong>æ¸²æŸ“å¤„ç†ç±»</strong>å®ç°äº†ç›‘å¬å™¨æ¥å£ï¼Œåœ¨åˆ›å»ºæ—¶æ³¨å†Œåˆ°ç›‘å¬å™¨ä¸­</p>
<pre><code class="language-java">public class GenericDialog implements ThemeChangeListener {

    public GenericDialog(Stage owner) {
        ...

        this.themeManager.addThemeChangeListener(this);

        ...
    }

    /**
     * è®¢é˜…ä¸»é¢˜æ ·å¼å˜æ›´ï¼Œä¸»é¢˜å˜æ›´åè‡ªåŠ¨åˆ‡æ¢å¼¹çª—æ ·å¼
     */
    @Override
    public void onThemeChanged() {
        // æ¸…ç©ºä¹‹å‰çš„æ ·å¼
        dialogScene.getStylesheets().clear();
        themeManager.applyStyle(WindowType.DIALOG_WINDOW,dialogScene);
    }
}
</code></pre>
<p>æ¸²æŸ“å¤„ç†ç±»ç›‘å¬ç›¸å…³æºç </p>
<pre><code class="language-java">public class RenderMarkdown  implements ThemeChangeListener {
    public RenderMarkdown(Tab tab) {
        ...

        // æ³¨å†Œè‡ªå·±ä¸º ThemeContext çš„ç›‘å¬è€…
        ThemeManager.getInstance().addThemeChangeListener(this);

        ...
    }
    /**
     * è®¢é˜…ä¸»é¢˜æ ·å¼å˜æ›´ï¼Œä¸»é¢˜å˜æ›´åè‡ªåŠ¨é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“å†…å®¹
     */
    @Override
    public void onThemeChanged() {
        // ä¸»é¢˜å˜æ›´åè‡ªåŠ¨æ¸²æŸ“
        renderMarkdown(null);
    }
}
</code></pre>
<h3 id="24-è£…é¥°æ¨¡å¼">2.4. è£…é¥°æ¨¡å¼</h3>
<p>å¯¹è‡ªå®šä¹‰åŸºç¡€å¼¹æ¡†åš<strong>å®šåˆ¶åŒ–çš„æ‰©å±•</strong>ï¼Œå®ç°ä¸åŒåœºæ™¯æ‰€éœ€çš„å¼¹æ¡†ã€‚å¼¹æ¡†è£…é¥°ç±»é€šè¿‡ç»„åˆçš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œå¯¹é€šç”¨å¼¹æ¡†åšå®šåˆ¶åŒ–è®¾ç½®</p>
<pre><code class="language-java">public abstract class DialogDecorator {
    private GenericDialog dialog;

    public DialogDecorator(GenericDialog dialog) {
        this.dialog = dialog;
    }

    public void removeLogo(boolean flag){
        dialog.removeLogo(flag);
    }
    // å§”æ‰˜è®¾ç½®æ ‡é¢˜
    public void setTitle(String title) {
        dialog.setTitle(title);
    }

    // å§”æ‰˜è®¾ç½®ä¸»ä½“å†…å®¹
    public void setContent(Node content) {
        dialog.setContent(content);
    }

    // å§”æ‰˜æ·»åŠ å†…å®¹
    public void addContent(Node node) {
        dialog.addContent(node);
    }

    // å§”æ‰˜è®¾ç½®åº•éƒ¨æŒ‰é’®åŒºåŸŸ
    public void setFooter(Node node) {
        dialog.setFooter(node);
    }

    // å§”æ‰˜æ·»åŠ åº•éƒ¨æŒ‰é’®
    public void addFooter(Node node) {
        dialog.addFooter(node);
    }

    // æ˜¾ç¤ºå¹¶é˜»å¡ï¼Œè¿”å›ç”¨æˆ·æ“ä½œç»“æœ
    public void showAndWait() {
        dialog.showAndWait();
    }

}
</code></pre>
<h3 id="25-å‘½ä»¤æ¨¡å¼å’Œå¤‡å¿˜å½•æ¨¡å¼">2.5. å‘½ä»¤æ¨¡å¼å’Œå¤‡å¿˜å½•æ¨¡å¼</h3>
<p>å°è£…å·¥å…·ç•Œé¢ä¸­çš„åŠŸèƒ½ç‚¹åŠå¿«æ·é”®å‘½ä»¤ã€‚å¤‡å¿˜å½•æ¨¡å¼è´Ÿè´£å®ç°<strong>æ’¤é”€</strong>å’Œ<strong>æ¢å¤</strong>åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå®ç°ç²¾ç»†åˆ°å•å­—ç¬¦çš„æ’¤é”€/æ¢å¤æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œä¸»è¦æ¶‰åŠçš„ç±»ï¼šç®¡ç†æ–‡æœ¬çŠ¶æ€<code>TextEditorOriginator</code>ã€ç®¡ç†æ’¤é”€å’Œæ¢å¤çš„æ ˆ<code>UndoRedoCaretaker</code>ã€‚</p>
<pre><code class="language-java">public class UndoRedoCaretaker {

    private Deque&lt;TextMemento&gt; undoStack = new ArrayDeque&lt;&gt;();
    private Deque&lt;TextMemento&gt; redoStack = new ArrayDeque&lt;&gt;();
    private TextEditorOriginator originator;
    private boolean isUndoRedo = false;
    private static final int MAX_HISTORY = 1000; // æœ€å¤šä¿å­˜ 1000 æ­¥

    public UndoRedoCaretaker(TextEditorOriginator originator) {
        this.originator = originator;
        // å­˜å…¥åˆå§‹çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œç¡®ä¿æ’¤é”€å¯ç”¨
        undoStack.push(originator.save());
    }

    // ä¿å­˜
    public void saveState(String text, int caretPosition) {
       ...
    }

    // æ’¤é”€
    public void undo() {
        ...
    }
    // æ¢å¤
    public void redo() {
        ...
    }
    public boolean isUndoRedo() {
        return isUndoRedo;
    }
    public void clear() {
        undoStack.clear();
        redoStack.clear();
    }

}
</code></pre>
<h2 id="-3-ç•Œé¢æˆªå›¾é¢„è§ˆ">ğŸ“¸ 3. ç•Œé¢æˆªå›¾é¢„è§ˆ</h2>
<h3 id="ç™½å¤©æ¨¡å¼çš„æˆªå›¾">ç™½å¤©æ¨¡å¼çš„æˆªå›¾ï¼š</h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1209017/202504/1209017-20250423074136627-1843893337.jpg" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="å¤œé—´æ¨¡å¼çš„æˆªå›¾">å¤œé—´æ¨¡å¼çš„æˆªå›¾ï¼š</h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1209017/202504/1209017-20250423074148456-936705160.jpg" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="ï¸4-æ€»ç»“">âœï¸4. æ€»ç»“</h2>
<p>YtyMark ç¼–è¾‘å™¨ç•Œé¢UIç›¸å…³åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå°†å¤šç§è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼èå…¥åˆ°å®é™…åº”ç”¨ä¸­ï¼Œä»å®è·µä¸­ç§¯ç´¯ç¨‹åºè®¾è®¡ç»éªŒã€‚</p>
<p>æ›´å¤šè¯¦ç»†å†…å®¹å¯ä»¥å‰å¾€ç¬”è€…å¾®ä¿¡å…¬ä¼—å·å›å¤ï¼š<strong>è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼</strong>ï¼Œæ¥è·å–ï¼Œåç»­æœ‰å…³è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼çš„æ–°èµ„æ–™éƒ½å¯ä»¥ä»è¿™ä¸ªå…¥å£è·å–åˆ°ã€‚</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><strong>ç§˜ç±1</strong>è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼æ‰‹å†Œï¼šã€ŠæŒæ¡è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ï¼š23ç§ç»å…¸æ¨¡å¼å®è·µã€é€‰æ‹©ã€ä»·å€¼ä¸æ€æƒ³ã€‹</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>ç§˜ç±2</strong>ç»ƒæ‰‹é¡¹ç›®ï¼šè®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼å®æˆ˜é¡¹ç›®--markdownæ–‡æœ¬ç¼–è¾‘å™¨è½¯ä»¶å¼€å‘ï¼ˆ<strong>å·²å¼€æº</strong>ï¼‰</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1209017/202504/1209017-20250423074201108-336561464.gif" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
